oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Aired Performance - 1946-09-21 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Aired performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on September 21, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Homegrown Trio; Hiram Higsby; Mary Lou; Dick Reinhart
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Opening statements and theme [incomplete] / (1:10) Hiram Higsby tells a joke and introduces the show / (1:30) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform an instrumental tune / (2:52) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (3:38) The Homegrown Trio perform "Happy Cowboy" / (5:30) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (6:23) Hiram Higsby performs "Brazen Little Raisin" / (7:50) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (8:27) Mary Lou performs "Saddle The Sun" / (10:48) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (11:40) Dick Reinhart performs "Ridin’ Down The Canyon" / (13:30) Hiram Higsby introduces Lem Hawkins and Hawkins tells a joke [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Reinhart, Dick;
